div.p:
Iter Camerarie tenta in pretorio burgi de Aberdene' per georgium narne' Ricardum de
Kintor Andream meignes et Johannem de marr' deputatos magni Camerarij septimo
die mensis maij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo sexagesimo quinto Quo die secte vocate
et curia affirmata absentes inferius patent in Rotulo sectarum dicti burgi

Johannes stewinson satisfaciet Dauid blabir' de quinque solidis et vj d' sibi debitis infra terminum
Juris plegius manus propria

Alexander blindsele satisfaciet dicto Dauid blabir' de quinque s' sibi debitis infra terminum
Juris plegius manus propria

Item gif Willame maliceson' may prefe Within xl dayis her' eftir immediate folowande /
with' twa sufficiande lele men vnsuspect that the x li' that Johne' of narne' tuke and ressauit
fra law hog of saynctandrowis was deliueryt til him to content and pay Johne' of gordone'
and to fre him of borowgang that he was cumyn for the saide law hog to the saide Johne'
of narne' sall content and pay to the saide Willam the saide x li' / and failyeande of his
prefe Johne' of narne' sall acquyt him be the gret athe sworne' that he ressauit nocht that
x li' nothir' on Johne' of gordonys behalfe na yeit on the saide Willammys and be
quyt and deliuer to the saide Willame all certyficacionys that he has belangande the saide
x li' gif he acquytis him and gif he acquitis him at the saide terme of xl dayis he sall
content and pay the saide x li' to the forsaide Willame / and gif the saide Willame bringis
or will lede his prevys within the xl dayis he sall ger' warne' his party viij dayis
befor' to her' and se his preffis swer' and til oppone' gif neide be agaynnis thaim as law
will

Item gif Johne moyses may prefe sufficiandly within xl dayis her' eftir that he is
dischargit of the borowgang and dettourschip that he come to Wat pyot for Johne'
of laiske of the some' of iiijor markis he sall be quyt of Wat pyotis clame of the saide
some' and failyeande of his preffis at the fornemnyt dayis he sal content and pay to the
saide Way pyot the saide iiijor merkis within lachfull tyme pleg' gilbert the Waus'

Item Dauid Wormot has tane to prefe sufficiandely within xl dayis her' eftir that the
clame movit agaynnis him be gilbert morison' of xj s' ij d' was endit be arbitouris
of befor' he sal vndirly thair decret quhat thai Juge him to pay failyeande of his preffe
at the fornemnyt dayis he sall content and pay the saide gilbert the fornemnyt some' pleg'
Robert Wormot his fadir'

Item Johne' mathison' gillespy sall content and pay to sere Androw henrison' chaplane'
xv s' for the Witsonday maile of his lande for the quhilkis he become borch' til
him for Jamys kuke within lachfull tym pleg' his awne hande

Item Willelmus de lammyntone fatebatur coram camerarijs ad satisfaciendum et deliberandum
gilberto de Kyntor vnum signetum aureum vel precium eiusdem videlicet iij li' infra terminum Juris
plegius manus propria et sua bona

Item Dauid blabir' satisfaciet thome litstar' de iiijor s' restantibus ad vltimum computum
ipsorum infra terminum Juris plegius manus propria et bona

Item Johannes Waus' Junior satisfaciet Willelmo de lammynton' de quinque s' infra terminum
Juris plegius manus propria et bona sua

Item Willelmus de lamyntone satisfaciet matheo coupar vnam barellam salmonum mensure
hamburgensis infra terminum et prefatus matheus satisfaciet et deliberabit dicto Willelmo
octo s' ad recepcionem dicte barelle salmonum ab eodem plegius manus propria et bona sua

Item the assise has ordanyt William of strade to preffe lachfully within xv dayis her'
eftir quhat that he is scathit of his skynnis strikine vp be Robert Wormot in his schip
the saide Robert sall content and pay him failyeande of his prefe the saide Robert sal be
quyt

Item the samyn assise has ordanit the saide Willam of strade to prefe with' lachfull
prefe within xv dayis her' eftir that the ryng that nicholace seruande to Will club
was lade him in wede of xv s' the saide nicholace sal content and pay him sa mekill
for the ryng and failyeande of his prefe within the saide terme the forsaide nicho
lace sal deliuer to the saide Willam v s' and he sall deliuer til hir' the forsaide ryng
pleg' his awin hande / the saide Willam is failyeit in the bringin of his preffis as
was befor' expremyt tharfor' he sall ressaue v s' fra the saide nicholace and deliuer
til hir' the forsaide ryng

Item the assise has ordanyt Johne' of fyfe to content and pay to henry hertwitson'
iiijor hamburgh barellis of salmunde within lachfull tyme And as anent the tothir'
iiijor hamburgh barellis of salmunde clamyt him be the saide henry gif Johne' of fyfe
may prefe lachfully within xv dayis her' eftir' immediate folowande that the saide
henry tuk to Johne' Wokate on his behalfe and dischargit him of that iiijor hamburgh
barellis of salmunde he sall be quyt of that iiij hamburgh barellis And gif Johne' of fyfe
failyeis of his prefe at the saide day as forsaide is he sall content and pay to the saide
henry that iiijor hamburgh barellis of salmunde togiddir with' the tothir iiijor hamburgh barellis
of salmunde befor' writtyn within' lachful' tyme plegius manus propria et bona sua

Item Isabella relicta quondam nicholaij benyng adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta pertur
bacione mariorie scherar' sponse alexandri andirson' et emendabit ei prout Jura volunt

Item si Johannes de marr' bet legittime probare poterit infra hinc et festum beati Johannes
baptiste proximum futurum quod gelice molendinarius deuenit sibi debitorem pro xij ouibus
vel valore earundem dictus gelice satisfaciet prefato Johanni dictas xij oues vel valorem
earundem infra terminum Juris et se deficerit in sua probacione ad prefatum diem vt premittitur dictus
gelice erit quytus de suo clameo dictarum omnium imperpetuum /

Item Johannes Wode adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Ade de Kynnor' et emendabit
eidem prout Jura volunt et prefatus Adam factus quitus ab omni perturbacione dicti Johannis
Wode

Item thomas de culane satisfaciet thome traile de vna li' grossorum monete flandrie infra
terminum Juris quam li' g' dictus thomas traile fecit clameum Roberto gillespy in dicto Itinere camera
rie et ipse Robertus factus fuit quitus de omni clameo dicte li' g'

Item cristiane the douchtir of vmquhile Johne' galt and full sistir to Jamys galt is oblist and
sworne' be the gret athe that gif it hapnys the saide Jamys hir' brothir' to cum hame liffande
that scho sall mak na stoppine til him til entir frely in his lande but demawnde and richt
swa gif ony of hir' sistirys cummys hame out of Inglande on maryit thar' to mak na
stoppine to thair' partis of the saide lande with' the pertinens bot til hafe fre entre to thair'
partis but questione or demawnde And thar' atour' the state and the possessione' that I hafe
takine of the saide lande with' the pertinens in thar' absens sall turne' thaim to na preiudice
anet anent thair' richtis and partis of the saide lande with' the pertinens in tyme to cum and in the
meyne tyme the saide cristiane sal nothir' sell wedset na analy the saide lande with' the
pertinens to nane on lyfe and gif scho dois it sal be of nane availe fors' nor effect
in contrar' of thair' richtis

Item thomas quelp adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta recepcione salmonum Ade de Kynnore quia
dicti salmones fuerunt signati signo ipsius ade et deliberabit eosdem salmones iterum prefato
Ade sine dilacione / Insuper dictus thomas quelp accusatus pro iniusta perturbacione dicti ade quitus
factus fuit per bonam assisam de omni perturbacione ipsius ade

Item Johannes Wode adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Ade de Kynnore et emendabit
ei prout Jura volunt Insuper dictus adam accusatus de iniusta perturbacione ipsius Johannis
factus fuit per assisam quitus de omni perturbacione ipsius Johannis Wode

Item patrike of badenach' has tane to bring sufficiande defesance within lachfull
tyme that the euident of wedset that Johne' henryson' of culane has of xx s' of
annuale of vmquhill Richarde Jacsonnys lande with the pertinens lyande in the castale
gate is of nane availe fors' nor effect bot adnullyt and expirit in it self be his
awine appoyntment made with' Johne' Dauyson' in his tyme

Item Johne' blindsele be the gret athe sworne' has desponyt in presens of the chawmerlane
syttande in Jugement that agnes his sistir deliueryt til him in keping certan char
teris the quhilkis Johne' of marr' clamys ar' his and his brothir sonnys And that the
samyn charteris war' tane away fra him vnwittandely na wist newir'
quha hade thaim till he herde Willame vokate grawnt thaim eftir that
Johne' of marr' hade gert curss' for thaim opinly in the kirke

the xxvj day of maij comperit in Jugement henry hertwitson befor' the
bailyeis and askyt to ger' call Johne' of fyfe to bring his preffis
as the assise ordanyt him to prefe that the forsaide henry hade tane to
Johne' vokate on his behalfe of iiij hamburgh barellis of salmunde and hade dis
chargit him tharof / the saide Johne' of fyfe oftymys callyt and warnyt be the
officiar' in proper' person' comperit nocht na brocht na preffis quharfor' the
saide henrik protestyt for his richt' of the saide four' hamburgh barellis of
salmunde and is dettour' til him of thaim eftir the deliuerance of the gret assise
as the act tharvpon' made beris witnes in it self this was done in the presens of
Androw meignes chawmerlane deput alexander blindsele and thomas of chawmer
bailyeis Johne' of scrogis adam of craufurde alexander meignes alexander of scrogis
alexander rolande lourens thomeson' seriande with' vthir' sindry

Item the assise has ordanyt Johne' of fyfe to content and pay henry hertwitson'
four' hamburgh barellis of salmunde within lachfull tyme and as anent the tothir'
four' hamburgh barellis of salmunde clamyt Johne' of fyfe be the saide henry gif Johne'
of fyfe may prefe within xv dayis next eftir' folowande the date of the
chawmerlanys air' befor the bailyeis that the saide henry tuke to Johne'
vokate of the payment of the saide four' hamburgh barellis of salmunde and dischargit
Johne' of fyfe tharof he is quyt of the saide henryis clame and gif he failyeis
of his prefe as saide is at the dayis fornemnyt he sal content and pay to the saide
henry that four' hamburgh barellis of salmunde within lachfull tyme togiddir' and at
anys with the tothir' four' hamburgh barellis of salmunde befor' expremyt this was
giffin furthe be the assise the ix day of maij the yer' of god et cetera lxv

Item the xv day her' eftir comperyt the forsaide henry in the tolbuthe befor' the
bailyeis and askyt at thaim be vertu thar' office to ger' call the saide Johne' of
fyfe with' his preffis as the assise hade ordanyt him anent the forsaide four' hamburgh
barellis of salmunde he oftymys callyt and nocht comperit nor na preffis be him lede nor
nane vthir' lachfull essonye made be him he is Jugit be the forsaide assise to
content and pay to the saide henry the forsaide four' hamburgh barellis of salmunde within
lachfull tyme becaus' he failyeit of his preffis leding at the fornemnyt dayis assignit
til him be the forsaide assise /

Item vicesimo quarto die mensis Junij Anno Domini et cetera lxvto accedens ad barram gilbertus
moryson' cum Andrea meignes suo prelocutore et vocari fecit coram balliuis in pretorio huius
burgi Robertum Wormot plegium pro Dauid Wormot filio suo ad intrandum dictum Dauid coram dictis
balliuis ad probandum legittime clameum xj s' et ij d' motum inter ipsum et dictum gilbertum prout
ordinatum fuit per bonam assisam in Itinere camerarie coram camerariis / qui quidem Robertus Wor
mot plegius dicti Dauid sepe vocatus ad intrandum dictum Dauid vt supra non comparuit nec intrauit
ipsum Dauid / quare prefatus Andreas prelocutor dicti gilberti porrexit plegium in manu Willelmj
atkinson' vnius bedellorum huius burgi quod exquo dictus Robertus non intrauit dictum Dauid ad
probandum premissa ipse gilbertus deuenit ad suum clameum contra prefatum Dauid de dictis xj s'
et ij d' et ad satisfaciendum dicto gilberto infra terminum Juris

Item the chawmerlane has ordanyt the four' bailyeis to cheis four' men to tak all
swyne that thai fande lows' vtow bande in ony mannis scathe or gangande on
the gate and present thaim to the maystir of the kirk werke and thai sal hafe for' thair'
trawaile of ilke swyne vj d' or ellis sla thaim quhar' thai finde thaim lous' and tak
the bodijs til eschete to thaim that slays thaim for' thai ar' forboddin bestis

Till all and sindry to quhais knawlagis thir' present lettres sal cum the aldirman
bailyeis and consale of the burgh of abirdene greting in god with your' vniuersite
ws avisitly til hafe set and to ferme lattyn and be the tenour' of thir present lettres settis and
to ferme lattis the vuir and the nethir' mylnys callit the Justice mylnys of the saide
burgh' with' thair' pertinens customys and dwyteis acht and wont til our' luffit nichbur'
mathou coupar and til his help cristy of abirdour' for the termys of xv yeris fullely and
continualy fra the fest of Witsonday next forou the date of the making of thir present lettres
to be compleit and runnyne but ony interrupcione the saide mathou and his help cristy of
abirdour' payande til ws yerely for' the ferme of the saide milnys x merkis of the vsu
ale payment of scotlande in maner' and fourme' as eftir folowys that is to say the vj
merkis of ferme' of the nethir' mylne of the first twa yeris of thair' entre to be
payit to Jonate meignes the spouse of vmquhile Johne' vokate quhom god
assoilye be assedacione made til him of befor' of the saide mylne' And on the samyn
wis' the iiijor merkis of ferme of the vuir mylne the fyrst thre termys eftir thair'
entre to hafe fre and to be alowyt to thaim for the biggine of it And thir termys of
the forsaide mylnys as saide is beande runnyne the forsaide mathou and his help
cristy of abirdour' sall content and pay til ws yerely for ferme of the saide twa mylnis
x merkis of the forsaide payment at twa vsuale termys of the yer' Witsonday that is
to say and martymes in Winter be ewinly porcionis to the vsche of the xv yeris be
for' expremyt And the forsaide mathou and cristy his help sal big and vphalde sufficiandly
the saide mylnys with' the pertinens and to deliuer thaim at the vsche of the fornemnyt termis
sufficiandely and profitabilly raperalit and biggit in all thingis necessar' alswele vtouth'
as enuuthe at the sicht of discrete personys to be chosine be ws tharto' for the quhilkis
thai binde and oblis' all thair' landis and gudis movabill' and vnmovabill' til ws in the
strataste stile and fourme' of obligacione / the entre of the forsaide mathou and of his
help cristy in the take of the saide mylnys with thair' pertinens at the fest of Witsonday
next forow the date of the making of thir' present lettres and frathine furth' to Joyse
and bruke the saide milnys with thair' pertinens for' the ferme befor' expremyt yerely
on to the tyme the termys of xv yeris forsaide be fullely compleit and runnyne In
witnes of the quhilk thing to thir present lettres our' common sele we hafe appensit at
Abirdene the xviij day of August the yer' of our' lorde et cetera lxv / tharatour' the saide
mathou and cristy sall grinde yerely to the priour' and conuent of the blak freris of this
said' burgh' four' chaldir of vitale multir' fre

Burgenses et confratres gilde facti tempore prepositure
Ricardi de Kintor de anno Domini et cetera lxvto

Decimo tercio die mensis septembris Johannes Jacobi de strabolgy ad instanciam et requestum domini comitis
de huntlie receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi pro vj marcis vsualis monete scocie
soluendis communitati huius burgi qui prestitit per fidelitate sua obseruanda Juratum solitum et consuetum et pro predicta summa
et pro distringibili terra habenda infra burgum infra annum et diem pro seruicia domini nostri regis Inuenit patricium de badenach'
plegium preposito et balliuis huius burgi

Item cristinus litstar' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi causa paterne libertatis qui soluit
v s' in alba bursa et prestitit pro fidelitate sua Juramentum solitum et consuetum /

Eodem die gilbertus moryson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi
qui prestitit Juramentum solitum et soluit v s' in alba bursa et non vltra causa paterna libertatis

xxij die mensis septembris Willelmus nory receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
huius burgi ad instanciam maioris partis consilij qui soluet preposito iiijor marcas et prestitit solitum
Juramentum pro fidelitate sua /

Johannes Watson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde pro iiijor marcis
solitum Juramentum
